channel.title: The DeepDepths Podcast
channel.description: A podcast about anything and everything!

item.title: Episode 14: War, part 1
item.description:
War! Time to bring the fight to the war mongers (see what we did there?) and chat about violent, international conflict.
(Unfortunately, there was a bit of noise on and off throughout this episode that we weren’t able to entirely remove. Apologies in advance.)
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com

item.title: Episode 13: Honoring Parents
item.description: Honoring your parents. We chat about the “first commandment with a promise”.
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com

item.title: Episode 12: The Aged & Eldery
item.description: Older folks, this one is dedicated to you! In this episode we talk about the aged and elderly. How we should treat them, appreciate them, and how much of a blessing they are to us.
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com

item.title: Episode 11: Atheism
item.description: Talking Atheism today. Some of our thoughts concerning the problems with denying the existence of a supernatural creator, and some possible motivations behind it.
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com

item.title: Episode 10: Children
item.description: It’s the big 10! For our 10th episode, we talk about children. Between the two of us, we have 14 children, so we have some experience in this field! Anyone hesitant to have children, have a listen and let us know how you feel! Contact us over at Gab!
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com

item.title: Episode 9: Abortion
item.description: Today we are talking about abortion. This can be a difficult subject for some to discuss, but there are babies out there to be saved!
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com

item.title: Episode 8: Feminism
item.description: Feminists: today we talk about you! Have a listen to hear our thoughts on this gynocentric (or is it, perhaps, something more?) ideology.
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com

item.title: Episode 7: Masculinity
item.description: Today we discuss masculinity. Is it toxic? Is it damaging society? Should we suppress masculine behavior in boys and men? Mainstream, progressive culture say yes. We give our thoughts!
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com

item.title: Episode 6: Homeschooling, part 2
item.description: Homeschooling, part 2! We go more in depth into how our families implement our own versions of homeschooling, and how to get started homeschooling yourself. Featuring a couple very special guests!
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com

item.title: Episode 5: Homeschooling, part 1
item.description: Homeschooling! Discussing homeschooling, the benefits, and the problem with public schools.
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com

item.title: Episode 4: Albania recap
item.description: Albania recap! Discussing Ed’s recent trip to Albania, and comparing & contrasting its culture and history to ours.
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com

item.title: Episode 3: Proverbs 25:26
item.description:
Musings on Proverbs 25:26!
“Like a muddied spring or a polluted well are the righteous who give way to the wicked.”
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com

item.title: Episode 2: Potpourri
item.description: Freeform conversation about all sorts of things, from woke language to homeschooling.
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com

item.title: Episode 1: The First Episode
item.description: Introductions and our thoughts on the dangers and future of a world full of ideological censorship.
item.author: thedeepdepths@protonmail.com
